Title.Language: Psali Adam for the Martyrdom of Saint Philotheus

Text.Language: Ari'alin kalwc: m~mai e~Pi,~rictoc: qen p~sai m~pia~gioc: pieyouab Vuloyeoc.
Praise well,Â / O beloved of Christ,Â / on the feast of the holyÂ / Saint Philotheus.

Title.Language: Psali Watos for the Martyrdom of Saint Philotheus

Text.Language: Amwini t/rou n~tenhwc: m~Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc: n~tentaio m~pimarturoc: pia~gioc Vuloyeoc.
Come all, let us praiseÂ / our Lord Jesus Christ,Â / and honor the martyr,Â / Saint Philotheus.

Everyone honors youÂ / in heaven and on earthÂ / for the purity you acquired,Â / O Saint Philotheus.

For you are belovedÂ / by your parents,Â / who initially worshiped the calf,Â / O Saint Philotheus.

Because of your blessed name,Â / your father and mother livedÂ / after they had tasted death,Â / O Saint Philotheus.

Truly, indeed,Â / you became a good warriorÂ / and donned the helmet,Â / O Saint Philotheus.
